TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INotifyHostEventHandler

Docs.summary: The interface that must be implemented in the host application to handle the method of the object when the object is hosted in a custom application.

remarks.para: The INotifyHostEventHandler interface is used to send data to the host application at any point using custom form code, particularly if the host cannot be accessed by using the property of the InfoPathEditor object.

For more information about the InfoPathEditor and the objects , see the MSDN article Hosting the InfoPath Form Editing Environment in a Custom Windows Form ApplicationWhat's New for InfoPath Developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public void NotifyHostEventHandler (object sender, string notification);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyHostEventHandler([in]object sender, [in]string notification) runtime managed
Public Sub NotifyHostEventHandler (sender As Object, notification As String)
public: void NotifyHostEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, System::String ^ notification);
abstract member NotifyHostEventHandler : obj * string -> unit

Docs.param: The object sending the notification to the host.
The contents of the message sent from the NotifyHost method.
Docs.summary: Handles the event from the method of the object when the object is hosted in a custom application.

remarks.para: For more information about the InfoPathEditor and the objects , see the MSDN article Hosting the InfoPath Form Editing Environment in a Custom Windows Form ApplicationWhat's New for InfoPath Developers.
